short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a very simple text to speech extension made for Windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a straightforward and user-friendly text-to-speech extension designed specifically for Windows. It’s built with simplicity in mind, making it easy for users to convert their text into audible speech. Whether you’re multitasking or have accessibility needs, this extension can enhance your computing experience by reading out your text in a clear and understandable manner. It’s a valuable tool for anyone who wants to listen to text rather than read it on the screen.
